description: A Jubo Dal man was killed in Noakhali. The Jubo Dal activist was identified as Rubel, 22, a local activist of the Jubo Dal. He was killed as the police opened fire at one stage of a clash with the processionists at Choumuhani Bazar in Begumganj upazila of the district
title: A Jubo Dal man was killed in Noakhali...
